Subject: Re: Helping To New Predacons

"Predacon against Predacon?" spoke Scorponok with worry in his eyes. "Why
is Megatron trying to take the Predacons, dosen't he already have theyre
support?" Then as if the thought dawned on him for the first time "and how
have you heard of me? Why are there so many Transformers all of a sudden?
Before I was disabled there was only seven" Scorponok say anxiously
clicking his claws.
